title: Software Engineer

Participate in the development of server-side Java components and handling data from Hybris CMS, applying design patterns and established guidelines by the customer. Contributed to the improvements in the continuous integration application used in the project. Currently working as a full-stack developer of one of the teams involved in the project. Technologies applied: Java 7, customer’s internal servlet container, Selenium, Ant, Javascript, Angular, Cypress, Protractor, NodeJs, MongoDB, Golang.Software consultant - Full-stack Software Engineer Involved in an agile software development process as a consultant for pamperedchef.com application, based in Chicago, CHI.
